name: Agent
description: level up to 6. As smart as equivalent Pilot program Core p.269

name: Browser
description: Cut Matrix Action Search time in half.

name: Configurator
description: Choose a configuration for your deck. May switch using full config stored in program.

name: Edit
description: +2 to Data Processing limit on Edit tests.

name: Encryption
description: +1 Firewall

name: Signal Scrub
description: -2 Noise

name: Toolbox
description: +1 Data Processing

name: Virtual Machine
description: Run 2 additional programs but take 1 additional unresisted matrix damage each time your persona takes matrix damage.

name: Armor
description: +2 to resist matrix damage.

name: Baby Monitor
description: Always know current Overwatch Score.

name: Biofeedback
description: Only works on biological matter. Target is hit with stun or physical damage equal to matrix damage. All causes damage to failed attack actions against you. Resisted with Willpower + Firewall.

name: Biofeedback Filter
description: +2 to resist biofeedback

name: Blackout
description: causes Stun damage to target even if they are in hot-sim.

name: Decryption
description: +1 to Attack

name: Defuse
description: +4 to resist damage from data bomb

name: Demolitions
description: +1 to Data Bomb rating.

name: Exploit
description: +2 to Sleaze when using Hack on the Fly

name: Fork
description: Single Matrix action vs two targets. Target defend using their own dice pools.

name: Guard
description: Reduce extra damage from marks by 1DV per mark.

name: Hammer
description: Whenever you cause matrix damage, excluding failed attacks against you, inflict an additional +2 DV.

name: Lockdown
description: Link-lock persona when you deal damage to them.

name: Mugger
description: +1 DV per mark.

name: Shell
description: +1 to resist matrix and biofeedback damage.

name: Sneak
description: +2 dice pool to defend agaisnt trace icon actions. DemiGod doesn't get physical location on convergence.

name: Stealth
description: +1 to sleaze

name: Track
description: Add 2 to Data Processing with tracing an icon or negates Sneak bonus.

name: Wrapper
description: Icons can be anything. Other personas need to at least suspect a wrapped icon.

name: Bootsrap
description: Change boot record of a device.

name: Search
description: Uses specific search algorythm on a host to find specific data. +2 to die pool when using Matrix Search.

name: Shredder
description: Add 2 to a Data Processing for deleting a file using Edit File.

name: Cat's Paw
description: Instead of dealing damage when using Data Spike cause negative die pool to target equal to 2 + marks. Marks added or removed will modify accordingly.

name: Cloudless
description: Move data off matrix to single device. Opposed by grid when using Edit File. Public: 6 |Local: 8 | Global: 10

name: Smoke & Mirrors
description: Add 1-5 to Noise and Sleaze
